mapper.insert: insert into `t_custom_package_relation` (custom_id, package_code, package_name, status, order_time, end_time, cancel_time, channel, opening_mode, create_time) values (#{customId}, #{packageCode}, #{packageName}, #{status}, #{orderTime}, #{endTime}, #{cancelTime}, #{channel}, #{openingMode}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update `t_custom_package_relation` set package_name = #{packageName}, status = #{status}, order_time = #{orderTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, cancel_time = #{cancelTime}, channel = #{channel}, opening_mode = #{openingMode}, create_time = #{createTime} where custom_id = #{customId} and package_code = #{packageCode}
mapper.select: select custom_id, package_code, package_name, status, order_time, end_time, cancel_time, channel, opening_mode, create_time from `t_custom_package_relation`
